titles.title: To amend the Clean Air Act to reform the renewable fuel program under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
